articles.description: LEADING clinicians have written to Boris Johnson warning the UK faces a 'second health catastrophe' because so many non-Covid patients are missing out on treatment as a result of the pandemic.

articles.title: NIH halts hydroxychloroquine study - POLITICO
articles.description: This could be the drug’s death knell.
articles.content: In a rush to find a cure, scientists around the world and in the U.S. began studying the drug. In late March, the FDA issued an emergency use authorizationfor the decades-old anti-malaria drug, and h… [+669 chars]

articles.title: Hundreds of millions of COVID-19 vaccine doses available for 2021 - WHO - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: “If we’re very lucky, there will be one or two successful [vaccine] candidates before the end of this year,” said Soumya Swaminathan, WHO chief scientist.
